# 脚手架常用 package

  • commanderopen in new window 命令行工具
  • sadeopen in new window 命令行工具
  • Inquireropen in new window 命令行交互
  • enquireropen in new window 命令行交互
  • semveropen in new window 环境检测，依赖约束
  • chalkopen in new window 命令行设置颜色
  • oraopen in new window 命令行 loading
  • fs-extraopen in new window 文件操作
  • download-git-repoopen in new window 下载模板
